entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming northeast 20 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
